job_history.work_description: Resolving payment issues and ensures timely payment to the vendors (Including Local and foreign vendors). Assisting all regional accountants for AP/GL/GR/IR related issues. Posting of all the admin related invoices like Rent, Electricity and Office Maintenance with cost centre allocation. Posting of import related invoices with Pan India business area.

Handling Petty cash on daily basis. Preparation of journal vouchers and commission statement. General ledger Reconciliation. Sundry debtors and creditors Analysis. Preparation Bank reconciliation statement on month wise.

education.university: Kamaraj College of Arts and science affiliated to Manonmaniam Sundaranar University

skills.name: Accounts Payable
skills.explanation: Handled AP related issues and ensured timely payment to vendors, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: General Ledger Reconciliation
skills.explanation: Handled general ledger reconciliation and posting of admin related invoices, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Bank Reconciliation
skills.explanation: Prepared bank reconciliation statements on a monthly basis, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Financial Analysis
skills.explanation: Analyzed sundry debtors and creditors, showing a solid working proficiency in financial analysis.

skills.name: Journal Entries
skills.explanation: Prepared journal vouchers, indicating a solid working proficiency in journal entries.

skills.name: Petty Cash Management
skills.explanation: Handled petty cash on a daily basis, showing a solid working proficiency in petty cash management.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Assisted regional accountants, indicating some practical experience in leadership.
